page.title: 17People in Stanwell cont.
page.content:
{Mr Underwood} Mr Underwood is a postman. He gets up at 4 o'clock in the morning to go to work. First he collects his letters and then does his round. He finishes at 12.30. The Sorting Office is where the postmen sort the letters into trolleys, for different places. The postman has to sort his own letters out into streets and houses. Bobby Aged 7yrs
{Mike the Milkman} Mike gets up at 4 am. He pulls the plug out of the milk float because it is electric and is left on at night to charge. He loads all the crates and then delivers the milk to all his customers. He helps his customers sometimes, like putting up curtains and mending things for them.
